Commands.Knight's Pride: Grants party BRV based on own INT BRV  Self: 6 turns 1 level of Bravery (limit 3)  HP damage to party further increases Bravery level by 1 (may only increase one level per turn)
Commands.Judgment Blade: Group melee BRV attack  All targets: Minute chance 1 turn Paralyze
Commands.Hallowed Bolt: 4-hit group melee BRV attack + group HP attack  Moderately increased BRV damage when attacking single target  Deals total HP damage to each target

Passives.Knight's Pride Light: Slightly lowers the Action Delay of Knight's Pride.
Passives.HP Damage Attack Up: Slightly raises Attack after taking HP damage.
Passives.Judgment Blade Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Judgment Blade.
Passives.BRV Guard Up: Slightly raises Defense when BRV is over 50%.
Passives.Knight's Pride Charge: Increases the max uses of Knight's Pride by 1.
Passives.Buff Boost: Slightly raises Max BRV while buffed.
Passives.Judgment Blade Charge: Increases the max uses of Judgment Blade by 1.
Passives.Brave Holy Knight: Slight raises Max BRV and Attack while Brave is active.
Passives.Buff Boost Speed: Moderately raises MAX BRV, SPD with active buffs
Passives.Knight's Pride Extension: When using Knight's Pride:   Grants 2 levels of Bravery   Bravery limit increased by 2   Moderate boost to BRV granted based on INT BRV   Increases BRV based on MAX BRV   Triggers additional HP attack after useWhile Bravery active:   HP Attack becomes HP Attack+ (increases BRV based on MAX BRV + HP attack)
Passives.All Bravery Initial Boost: Slightly raises party's INT BRV, MAX BRV while Bravery active
Passives.Judgment Blade Extension: While Bravery active:   Becomes Judgment Blade+ (additional group HP attack; deals proportionate HP damage to each target)   BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack+ (grants party BRV based on own ATK after BRV attack)When using Judgment Blade, Judgment Blade+:   Becomes 3-hit BRV attack; largely increased cumulative BRV damage

Weapons.Defender CP: 35: Raises the potency of Judgment Blade and Judgment Blade+.Moderately increases BRV damage to a single target.Raises the success rate of Paralysis.
Weapons.Coral Sword CP: 15: Lowers the Action Delay of Knight's Pride.Extends the duration of Brave.Raises the potency of the BRV gain based on Initial BRV.
Weapons.Save the Queen CP: 70: May equip the EX Ability Hallowed Bolt
